content:
It sounds like you have some great memories of that family gathering! Grilling a variety of meats and vegetables is always a great way to feed a crowd, and it's even more impressive when you can cook everything quickly and efficiently on a large grill.

I'm glad you're excited to try out the marinades and sauces for bulgogi beef skewers. Korean-style BBQ is a great way to add some variety to your grilling repertoire, and it's always fun to experiment with new flavors and ingredients.

If you have any more questions or need further assistance with your grilling adventures, feel free to ask. I'm always here to help. Happy grilling!
